column4: someone recommended using psyBNC on xchat/breezy preview.  can't 'install' it. anyone have any tips?
no clue.. also tried using just 'bnc'.. not sure how to configure it though.
i just want to mask real ip on here.
it has some uses.. like it can sort of make you stay on irc, then you can connect to it from other macines and still be in same room, or somthing.. i forget.
and a proxy would not show your origianl ip.
i'm new irc/xchat.. am assuming red text was a PM (?) if not, sorry for messaging you, Dr_Willis
redtext may be text that has your nick in it. hjk57
i just don't like my ip freely available to anyone..  so any tips ?
dont worry about it. every time ive seen some one be paranoid about that on irc.. its not been worth worrying about
